Why the Debate Over Abortion Seems Intractable
Symmetries that emerge from the analysis of the major arguments on either
side  of  the  abortion  debate  may  explain  why  the  abortion  debate  seems  
intractable.  Consider  the  following  standard  anti-abortion  argument:  
Fetuses are both human and alive. Humans have the right to life. Therefore,
fetuses have the right to life. Of course, women have the right to control their
own bodies, but t
